## âœ… Checklist

<!--
  Before submitting your pull request, please review the following:
-->

- [ ] I have read and followed the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/chirag127/MoodBite-Mood-And-Diet-Tracker-React-Native-Mobile-App/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines.
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if applicable).
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors in the linter or compiler.
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works.
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes.
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published.
- [ ] I have updated the `AGENTS.md` file to reflect any new tools or methodologies.
